law.catch_line: In addition to the powers and duties set forth elsewhere in this title, the Board has the following ...

text.section: With regard to any list kept by the Board under subsection (a)(10) of this section, upon written request from an individual licensee the Board shall delete that individual's name from any licensee list purchased from the Board.

section.section:
The Board is the only unit of the Department that is responsible for adopting rules and regulations to determine:
Individuals to whom any act of the practice of registered nursing and licensed practical nursing may be delegated; and
The acts that may be delegated safely.
The Department shall retain its authority to require training for nonlicensed patient care personnel under § 19-308.1 of the Health - General Article.
